QuestData.Title: The High Council's Decision
QuestData.Description: The High Council is ready to decide on the war with the Neferset tribe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Phaoris at Ramkahen in Uldum.
QuestData.RewardText: Two pieces of news have reached me today, $c.$B$BThe High Council has reached a decision about war and my brother has been slain by Neferset scum.$B$BI no longer need to wait for the former to lead my people into battle. We move against the Neferset as soon as my people are ready.
